'''Epitome Invocation''' is a [[Weapon Event Wish]] in [[Version 4.7]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2024-06-25 18:00:00 &mdash; 2024-07-16 14:59:59

===Summary===
* During the event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star weapon {{Wish Item|Silvershower Heartstrings}} and the 5-star weapon {{Wish Item|Splendor of Tranquil Waters}} will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the event-exclusive 4-star weapons {{Wish Item|Lithic Blade}} as well as the 4-star weapons {{Wish Item|Lion's Roar;Favonius Lance;Favonius Codex;Sacrificial Bow}} will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* During the event wish, use [[Epitomized Path]] to chart a course towards a promotional 5-star weapon, such as {{Wish Item|Silvershower Heartstrings}} or {{Wish Item|Splendor of Tranquil Waters}}. For more information on Epitomized Path, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.
* Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapons will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
